definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn

sentences.english: I was at their wedding too.
sentences.chinese: 我也參加了他們的結婚大典。

sentences.english: I was there when the ceremony (of the Founding of the PRC)going.
sentences.chinese: 我能參加開國大典那真是十分榮幸。

sentences.english: He wrote an exciting eulogy for the celebrations on the Double Tenth Day.
sentences.chinese: 他爲國慶大典寫了激情澎湃的頌辭。

sentences.english: Kai Guo Da Dian is a documentary.
The coronation is only two days away. I fear this will not be ready in time.
sentences.chinese: 離冊封大典還有兩天，我怕我繡不好。

sentences.english: I hereby proclaim the Empress coronation will take place on the fifteenth day of this month.
sentences.chinese: 傳朕口諭，本月十五，舉行皇后冊封大典。

sentences.english: Royal wedding ceremony is often held here.
sentences.chinese: 王室的婚喪大典也常在這裏舉行。

sentences.english: What Kinds of Books are Yongle Dadian and Siku Quanshu?
sentences.chinese: 《永樂大典》和《四庫全書》是什麼樣的書？

sentences.english: However, it is now used in my coronation.
sentences.chinese: 沒想到，卻要用在我的冊封大典上。

sentences.english: SUN Yat- sen's Grand Funeral in 1929 was a representative of ritual politics in modern China.
sentences.chinese: 孫中山奉安大典是現代儀式政治的典型案例。

sentences.english: He wrote an exciting eulogy for the celebrations on the National Day.
sentences.chinese: 他爲國慶大典寫了激情澎湃的頌辭。

sentences.english: I attended a birthday party in Beijing yesterday for Confucius.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，我參加了在北京舉行的祭孔大典。

sentences.english: Chinese singer Faye Wong participated in the ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 歌星王菲參加了安奉大典。

sentences.english: Shooters ceremony to be held the next day, the Mountain Festival.
sentences.chinese: 第二天舉行射獵大典，祭山神。

sentences.english: There are going to be more persons at the celebration of National Day than ever before.
sentences.chinese: 可能會有比往年更多的人蔘加這次國慶大典。

sentences.english: It is my pleasure to attend the Ceremony of the founding of the PRC.
sentences.chinese: 我能參加開國大典那真是十分榮幸。

definition: meetings conducted by rulers in feudal China for the purpose of formalizing alliances, finalizing treaties
to offer sacrifices to one's ancestors
to invite the groom (who will live with the bride's family)/to take a wife by one's own choice
to confer a title upon sb/to dub/to crown/to invest with rank or title
